title: A Place in the country: Renfrewshire Regional Park
creator_credit: Tree Films, Films of Scotland and David Lewis
brief_description: Describes the first country park to be established in Scotland. Different groups of people are seen visiting the park: a family picnic party, a young couple going for a walk, two hikers and a party of school children. A regatta at Castle Semple Loch is shown. The film shows the range of attractions the park holds for all.
